lead: Computational condensed matter physics: structural, electronic, and magnetic properties of materials using first-principles and advanced simulation methods.

topics.title: First-principles & Linear Response
topics.summary: Accurate electronic structure calculations, linear response approaches, and model Hamiltonians to predict materials behavior.

topics.title: Correlated Systems
topics.summary: Weakly and strongly correlated materials, including transition metal compounds and semiconductors, probed via simulations.

topics.title: Topological & Magnetic Phases
topics.summary: Topological insulators and emergent magnetic properties explored with Monte Carlo methods and renormalization group tools.
